{"id":1250632277,"question_id":3395,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1714978425,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"413 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1250632277/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Length of Anagram Concatenation","memory":"51.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minAnagramLength(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n\n        // Calculate the gcd of the lengths of all substrings of s\n        int gcd_length = n;\n        for (int size = 1; size < n; ++size) {\n            if (n % size == 0) {\n                bool is_anagram = true;\n                for (int i = size; i < n; i += size) {\n                    if (!isAnagram(s.substr(0, size), s.substr(i, size))) {\n                        is_anagram = false;\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n                if (is_anagram) {\n                    gcd_length = gcd(gcd_length, size);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return gcd_length;\n    }\n\nprivate:\n    bool isAnagram(string s1, string s2) {\n        sort(s1.begin(), s1.end());\n        sort(s2.begin(), s2.end());\n        return s1 == s2;\n    }\n\n    int gcd(int a, int b) {\n        while (b != 0) {\n            int temp = b;\n            b = a % b;\n            a = temp;\n        }\n        return a;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-length-of-anagram-concatenation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
